Chelmsford Winter Beer & Cider Festival 2020

Wednesday 19th to Saturday 22nd February 2020

King Edwards Grammar School, Broomfield Road, Chelmsford, CM1 3SX

Chelmsford Summer Beer & Cider Festival 2020

Tuesday 7th to Saturday 11th July 2020

Admirals Park, Rainsford Road, Chelmsford, CM1 2PL


The festival is organised and run by volunteers, like all CAMRA festivals. We always welcome volunteers both old and new.   Find out more
